content: crosshatch cowl yarn 1 skein malabrigo merino worsted azul bolita hook h 5 00mm accessories oblong or large button gauge 21 st x 7 row = 4 - using the stitch pattern below i designed this cowl with the help of 101 crochet stitches book from interweave press i was on the lookout for a simple and quick pattern to use but could not find one to suite my taste thus the crosshatch cowl was born pattern - chain 91 this includes the turning chain row 1 skip 2 chain counts as first double_crochet 2 double_crochet into next chain *skip 3 chain 1 single_crochet into next chain chain 3 1 double_crochet into each of next 3 chain repeat from * to last 4 chain skip 3 chain 1 single_crochet into last chain turn row 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 2 double_crochet into first single_crochet *skip 3 double_crochet 1 single_crochet into first of 3ch ch3 1 double_crochet into next 2ch 1 double_crochet into next single_crochet repeat from * until last 3 stitches then skip 2 double_crochet 1 single_crochet into top of the turning chain turn copyright 2008 by stephanie gage all rights reserved http //stephig wordpress com row 3 end repeat row 2 the cowl shown below was done in 10 row - when you get to the last stitch of your final row work the single_crochet as usual and then fasten_off this cowl looks great in both positions featured below if there are any questions or comments please contact me at stephig85@gmail com copyright 2008 by stephanie gage all rights reserved http //stephig wordpress com
